misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi is a formidable competitor known for his power draw, a shot shape he has honed over years of dedicated practice at St. Laurence Golf. While some might find his intense focus intimidating, those who know him best recognize a deep well of sportsmanship beneath the surface.

A seasoned participant in the Hector Trophée, Jussi has graced the fairways in four past editions of the tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded his grasp thus far, Jussi's unwavering dedication and competitive spirit make him a player to watch each and every year.
Although Jussi is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his fans remain hopeful that a last-minute change might bring him back to the competition.
